meanings.sent1: The small plant showed signs of surviving the harsh winter.
meanings.sent2: The family was surviving on the little food they had left.
meanings.sent3: The old car, barely surviving, sputtered along the road.
meanings.sent4: In the desert, only the cacti seemed to be truly surviving.
meanings.sent5: The lone tree, surviving against all odds, stood tall in the storm.

meanings.definition: Remaining alive after a dangerous situation
meanings.sent1: The surviving crew members were rescued from the sinking ship.
meanings.sent2: The surviving animals emerged from the burnt forest.
meanings.sent3: The surviving cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: The surviving soldier returned home with tales of bravery.
meanings.sent5: The surviving plants in the garden bloomed beautifully after the storm passed.

meanings.sent1: The surviving buildings from the ancient city were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The surviving traditions were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The surviving piece of cake tempted me from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The surviving memories of childhood brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The surviving documents provided valuable insights into the past.
